table.name: attendance_record
table.all_each_time_count: select weekday(date_time) as _week, date_format(date_time,'%%H') as each_hour, count(weekday(date_time)) as num from `attendance_record` where `record_type` = %(record_type)s and date_time between current_date()-weekday(current_date()) and current_date() + 7 - weekday(current_date()) GROUP BY _week, each_hour ORDER BY date_time asc
table.today_clockin_count: select count(DISTINCT user_id) FROM `attendance_record` WHERE `record_type`=0 AND DATE(date_time)=current_date();
table.self_week_search: select weekday(date_time) as day, record_type, date_time from attendance_record where user_id = %(user_id)s and date_time between current_date()-weekday(current_date()) and current_date() + 7 - weekday(current_date()) ORDER BY date_time asc;
table.self_timestamp_search: select weekday(date_time), date_format(date_time,'%%H'), 7 from `attendance_record` where `user_id` = %(user_id)s and `record_type` = %(record_type)s and date_time between current_date()-weekday(current_date()) and current_date() + 7 - weekday(current_date()) ORDER BY date_time asc;

table.name: joint_search
table.get_all_seats_arrangement: SELECT arrangement_id, row, col, user_name, a.is_leader, a.seat_id, a.user_id FROM seat_info JOIN seat_arrangement a ON seat_info.seat_id = a.seat_id JOIN user_info u ON a.user_id = u.user_id;
table.get_the_seat_arrangement_pagenation: SELECT arrangement_id, row, col, user_name, a.is_leader, a.seat_id, a.user_id FROM seat_info JOIN seat_arrangement a ON seat_info.seat_id = a.seat_id JOIN user_info u ON a.user_id = u.user_id WHERE a.seat_id = %(seat_id)s limit %(start)s, %(num)s;
table.get_the_seat_arrangement: SELECT arrangement_id, row, col, user_name, a.is_leader, a.seat_id, a.user_id FROM seat_info JOIN seat_arrangement a ON seat_info.seat_id = a.seat_id JOIN user_info u ON a.user_id = u.user_id WHERE a.seat_id = %(seat_id)s;
